summary: In the West Berlin of the 1960s, two British agents are killed by a Nazi group, prompting British Intelligence to dispatch agent Quiller to investigate.
cast: George Segal|Alec Guinness|Max von Sydow|Senta Berger|George Sanders|Robert Helpmann|Robert Flemyng|Peter Carsten|Ernst Walder|Edith Schneider|Philip Madoc|Günter Meisner|John Rees|Bernard Barnsley|Victor Beaumont|Harry Brooks Jr.|Otto Friese|Herbert Fux|Paul Hansard|Philo Hauser|John Moulder-Brown|Hans Schwarz Jr.|Herbert Stass|Konrad Thoms|Claus Tinney
keywords: espionage|neo nazi|cold war|british intelligence|based on novel
title: Conspiración en Berlín
